title: Berampute beram venga Zana an thut khawmin
lyrics:
Berampu te beram venga,
Zana an thut khawmin;
Lal tirhkoh ropui lo chhukin,
An val a rawn An a.

Anni hlauva an khurh laiin,
Hlau lovin ngai rawh u;
Chanchin Tha leh lawm tlak em em,
Mitin tan ka rawn thlen.

Chhandamtu, Lalpa Krista kha,
Davida thlah zingah;
Vawiinah hian a lo piang ta,
Tiin a lo au va.

Chu veleh Lal Pathian taka,
Lawmna hla chu sain;
Van mi thianghlim an lo chhuak a,
Lalpa Pathian fakin.

Lalpa tan ropuina awm se,
Lei chunga a lawmte;
Mihring tan remna leng sela,
Tiin an aupui a.

Fapa kan beisei bera kha,
Tunah a lo piang ta;
Lei leh vanah a Lal reng ang,
Hnam tinin an bia ang.

A hming-Maka, Remruattua,
Remna Lal, Pathian Chaka;
Chatuan Pa, Lal lian a ni ang,
Chatuanin an fak ang.

A thiltihtheihna a pung ang,
A lo darh zau zel ang;
A rorel a kin tawh lovang,
Leiah rem leng sela.
